name: View Debug Log
author: Rodolfo Buaiz

sections.description: Adds a settings page to view and clear the Debug Log (/wp-content/debug.log)
sections.changelog:
• 2013.09.29

    Added notice if WP_DEBUG not set correctly.

  • 2013.09.13.3

    Reset bug fix.

  • 2013.09.13.2

    Multisite bug fix.

  • 2013.09.13

    Initial Public Release.

upgrade_notice: Version 2013.09.25 Added notice if WP_DEBUG not set correctly.
